website_summaries.verdict: Has a lot of features for a price that surpasses its competitors.
pros: Offers comparable features of more costly models
Has six alarm sounds and vibration option
Toggle clip is secure and durable
cons: Our testers found that some deep-sleeping children didn't hear the alarm

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item for my daughter. The directions ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my daughter. The directions are geared towards boys so we had to improvise the placement of the sensor. My daughter has slept through every level of noise since infancy and this was no different. I slept in the same room with her and by the time I woke her after the alarm woke me up each time, it was too late. We will continue to use this but I am wondering if I should have done more research for an alarm designed with girls in mind. The rating I am giving is mainly for the design/sensor placement and the male-oriented instructions. If this is designed primarily for boys, the product description should state this.
customer_reviews.author: TheRevenant

customer_reviews.title: Adios diapers !!!
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU!! My 7yo son wet his bed despite everything I have tried, I stayed up for 3 months, woke him up 3 times/night just to get get him use to getting up at night to use the bathroom but he went right back at it after the 3 months. Sometimes he went to bed at 10 pm and by the time I woke him at 1200 am he was soaked. NOT ANYMORE... we are 3 weeks into this product and he got his underwear wet just 2 times !! This is bewond my expectations and I didn't even have to wake him up or anything. PS: my son is an extreme heavy sleeper. Thank you so much !!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I heard mixed reviews about the effectiveness of alarms and our pediatrician wasn’t very optimistic. But my 11 year old was determined to try it. It worked like a charm! We also bought a book that I read together with my daughter, and we followed all of the suggestions. With the help of the alarm, she gradually started to have better nights and began to wake herself up. After about two months, she no longer needed the alarm. My daughter is so thrilled that she has been dry for a few months now. She asked me to write a good review so other kids could get the same help if they needed it. We highly recommend the alarm!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fisher-Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 nights
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore this 2 nights. The alarm won't stop alarming even after I hit reset.
customer_reviews.author: SnoozeDragn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work consistently. Only went off half the time which made it completely useless. Thankfully Amazon refunded me without issue but don't waste your time on this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rupar

customer_reviews.title: A little tricky for a girl
customer_reviews.text: This product would be perfect for a boy. It was a little tricky with a girl. I had her wear underwear under her good nights and put the sensor between her legs. When I ordered it she had started having dry nights a few nights a week. We started using it and the alarm never went off. She had all dry nights. I guess her knowing that the sensor was there was all her brain needed to get her to stay dry. 2 weeks in and she’s still dry!
customer_reviews.author: Pet817

customer_reviews.title: Saved us!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has struggled with bed wetting for years. Our doctor recommend a bed wetting alarm. I was skeptical at first but for $28 it was worth a try. I can happily say that we have gone a month being 99% dry! Only one day she had an accident but that was because I didn't place it in the right spot. When the alarm does go off it wakes up my daughter and myself right away and it makes her stop peeing. She is such a sound sleeper she wouldn't wake up before. I definitely recommend trying this!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: My child is 10 and has always been a heavy sleeper. We bought her an alarm years ago which she just ripped one night without even knowing it! Needless to say I was worried we'd have a repeat of that incident. Luckily time was our friend. I think last time she was just too young (about 5) and hey body needed a bit more time. Now she's fully trained at night and this alarm helped! She's been dry for over 2 weeks and she's ecstatic as am I!!
customer_reviews.author: dupita

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, buy a good one instead
customer_reviews.text: Alarm worked correctly for about a week. After that wetness was not detected and alarm would not sound. Alarm would however go off in the middle of the day when not attached to anything. So much for trying to save some money on a cheaper product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I've read mixed reviews, but it definitely does what ...
customer_reviews.text: I've read mixed reviews, but it definitely does what it is supposed to do. If your child gets scared because of the noise, she/he may just be too young to wear this device anyway. My son was 8 when we started using the alarm. I slept in his room for the first week just to get him used to the routine. Once he knew what he was supposed to do, he was able to remove the alarm, change his underpants/bedding, etc., all by himself. It took us several months but he is finally dry now for the most part, except very occasional accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Akiko Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The men in my family have experienced trouble with this problem 4 Generations. I had an uncle you didn't stop until he was 18 grandfather was 15 I was 14 there was nothing you could do back then but change your sheets every night is embarrassing I know it was hard on my mom. My son is 9 I bought this alarm he is at 2 weeks of no accidents he now wakes up and goes to the bathroom before his alarm goes off so that is alarm does not go off.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky S

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait. This is a LIFE changer
customer_reviews.text: Very skeptical of this product. My husband & I were desperate to help our 8 year old. His bed wetting was very embarrassing for him as our older & younger children “noticed” that an 8 year old shouldn’t be wetting the bed multiple times a week. Also UGH, all of the washing! This product saved our child’s self esteem and our water bill! We used as directed, and within less than a month we achieved success!!! YAY! It’s been over one year since we utilized this product, and we have only had a couple of accidents after staying up late & drinking late. We consider that normal. Go for it. It worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: WileE2900

customer_reviews.title: If you need it to be loud, this is the one
customer_reviews.text: We tried a couple different pee alarms. This one had the most options for the tone and volume of the alarm. At it's lowest setting, it's still rather obnoxious. After struggling with consistency, my kid used this a couple of times and then just sort of figured out that she could stay dry at night rather than put up with this alarm nonsense. We battled night wetting for years, now at age 9 she is finally over it. I think this alarm was just the last straw to convince her subconscious to wake up when she needs to pee. So if you have a heavy sleeper, and you want to try the most obnoxious alarm, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something FINALLY worked!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift/idea that may help our 7 year old with bed wetting. He was having accidents pretty much every night and we tried SO many things and felt like we had completely run out of options. The buzzer went off when he put it on the first night (a little day accident leftover apparently) and since then, we haven’t even had it go off! He’s waking up every night to go to the bathroom and we haven’t had an accident since we started using this 8 nights ago! Nothing but good things to say about this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 weeks in
customer_reviews.text: We are 6 weeks in. My 9 year old deep sleeper wets the bed every night. We tried limiting fluids, chiropractic care, reward systems, waking him at night. Nothing. He can do the clip himself, no problem. The alarm works great. It’s doing what it is designed to do. Unfortunately, we are plugging away for mild improvements. He still wets the bed every night, but sometimes only once instead of five times. He is getting up when the alarm goes off (sometimes by himself, sometimes with my encouragement). But the thing that gives me hope is that sometimes he is getting up before the alarm goes off. I will check back in when the 12 weeks is over.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Young

customer_reviews.title: Helps those heavy sleepers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 1/2 yr old that kept bed wetting. I spoke to my MIL who raised 7 children & she told me about a bed wetting alarm that she used with 2 of her kids. She said it worked awesome very quickly. She said she just thought the kids were really heavy sleepers & just needed a little wake up. That's exactly what it was for our son. A heavy sleeper. We have been using it for 2 weeks & have only had 2 bed wetting experiences since we started, compared to every night b/4 this alarm. He also LOVES the sticker chart of progress too!!! He reminds ME about that!
customer_reviews.author: Momof7Ps

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t wake my daughter but wakes us so it’s helped a lot. She was wet every morning and we were desperate to get her broke at night at age 8! We are three weeks in and she’s had three wet night two cloudy and the rest sunny on the sticker chart! Amazing product! Hooking it to her panties is kinda rough but manageable and I do wish it was louder! But all in all worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: No more wet bed.
customer_reviews.text: It worked. Not on the first night or the first week but it started to condition my daughter and slowly after about 2 weeks she started getting up...first with the alarm, then on her own and then later and later until she gets up right before dawn. She is so happy and I am happy for her. No more wet beds. So glad I didn't scold her or make her feel bad about something that is so common with many kids who are deep deep sleepers. The alarm worked! We used it with night time pants at first and then with regular underwear and then she was able to let it go all together.
customer_reviews.author: KriselKeeper

customer_reviews.title: Not just for children
customer_reviews.text: I am a 64-year-old quadriplegic with an indwelling catheter. I have had numerous problems with bladder spasms which would result in bed changes not to mention skin irritation. I ordered this alarm in hopes that I could put it on the dressing of my suprapubic catheter and eliminate the wet bed. I am thrilled to say that this is probably the best investment I've made in the 28 years of being a quadriplegic. The clamp is a little difficult to figure out, but it works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Philip E. Rogge

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our 7 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this product. She is 7 and used to soak a pull-up nightly. Within 3 weeks she was waking in the middle of the night to go on her own. She is now out of pull-ups and staying dry at night! We did put on panties, attached the device, and then put pull-ups on over top. It worked great and was less mess as she was learning. It vibrates and you can pick from 3 sounds. Our daughter liked picking the sound. We tried waking her before we bought this and it did not work out at all.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! Out daughter just turned 6 and was still sleeping in a diaper. We bought incontinent pads and this alarm. At first I woke her up in the middle of the night to pee and now she only needs the alarm. I'm so impressed. I'm glad we chose this one instead of the ones that were over $100. I only wish I knew about these a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bentley

customer_reviews.title: It works and great value
customer_reviews.text: Overall this device does the job! It will definitely wake a sleeping child as soon as any moisture is detected . We have had success with this product and it was worth the money. Only two things I would change is ease of clipping into place and the ease of silencing the alarm . It is loud and startling and frustration trying to find the button to turn it off when you wake up startled trying to help your little one turn it off . Overall great value for the product
customer_reviews.author: Dani Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Best money I ever spent!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best money we have ever spent! Used it for our 6yo boy who was still in pull-ups at night. We tried everything the experts say to do to try and train him and it didn’t work. This device had him completed trained in less than two weeks!! It’s like the alarm helped him connected his full bladder feeling with his brain. It was a rough first few nights but totally worth seeing it through. I would recommend this to anyone struggling to night train their child. We quit using the alarm after a couple of weeks. He has now gone a solid month without a single incident.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure what to expect but within 2 weeks our kid was potty trained successfully with a random accident here and there. He was a heavy sleeper and wouldn’t wake up. While he cried hysterically the first couple times due to the loud noise of the alarm we were able to calm him easily and get him back to sleep quickly after cleaning him and the bed up. We used a washable pee mat under him for the 2 weeks of accidents to make clean up easier for us as tired parents
customer_reviews.author: LindS

customer_reviews.title: Totally works!
customer_reviews.text: We were having issues with getting our 6-year-old son at night. Even though he went to use the potty before sleeping and we'd try to make sure he didn't drink before bedtime, he still had lots of accidents. He started using this alarm & w/in a few weeks, he is now accident free & not using the alarm at all. This item is less expensive than the blue tooth version that is already inside some underwear. It looks cumbersome to wear but my son got use to it & put it on himself & actually enjoyed having it on night.
customer_reviews.author: Code name April

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, maybe too well for my sensitive son. He is 11 and has sensory issues and did not like being woken up. However, it’s merely the fact that this device was doing its job. In order to get the clip to stay I would also safety pin the cord to his undies, otherwise he would pull it off in his sleep. This worked perfectly to keep it in place and ensure the alarm would go off at the first drop of wetness. When the alarm goes off he wakes up and stops emptying his bladder which leads to minimal clean up.
customer_reviews.author: elvia lopez

customer_reviews.title: Effective for son w ADHD
customer_reviews.text: One of my stepsons, at almost age 10, was still wearing nighttime pull-ups because of routine bed wetting. My stepson is on the autism spectrum and is diagnosed with ADHD. He had reached the point where wanted to stop wetting the bed and was open to trying an alarm. We chose this one because of its ratings and inexpensive cost. It did work, though it took months rather than a week or two, in part because my stepson is with us half the time and the other parent wasn’t interested in trying the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Pizzercat

customer_reviews.title: Hate it. It doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return it but the return window has passed because you have to have time to try it out. However, by the time that you are able to have your child truly try it out then your return window have expired. I would not recommend this product to anyone because it doesn't wake my child up. It does not accomplish the goal here. I was told by the doctor that this should show a significant difference in my child's bed wetting within a month. However, it hasn't worked well even for a day. I am truly disappointed. I guess I went with the wrong company.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My son will be 9 in December and he’s been wetting the bed for years. (Heavy sleeper) he’s been using this alarm for three weeks now and has had no more accidents in the last two. Keep in mind he is almost 9 but he puts it on on his own every night. I helped him the first week but he’s got it down now. I expected it to take longer to work but I think he’ll be ok to take it off in a couple more weeks. He has had a few nights he wakes up before it goes off (before he starts to pee). I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: os

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one!
customer_reviews.text: We thought this was going to be great however within 3 days the alarm will not shut off after it is triggered !!! We ended up having to take the batteries out. The reset button would not turn off the alarm. Then last night we put the batteries for my son to go to bed and with in 5 minutes it went off and would not stop ... took batteries out waiters a minute then put them back in alarm still going off and the reset would not stop it.. do not waste your money on this product!!! Very frustrating !!
customer_reviews.author: jeninnc

customer_reviews.title: Best. Invention. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Wish so much that we had tried this years ago when the pediatrician recommended one, instead of buying Pull Ups for years for night time!! Used on my almost 8 year old son and my 5 year old son. Both wake up dry every single morning now. Took approx 2 Wks or so for each child. I was worried about a loud alarm waking the whole house up at night, but honestly, it was a non-issue. I think they came up by me a couple nights only for some help. BUY IT!!!!! You’ll never have to use pull ups again! The boys feel so good about themselves now too! :)
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: On the way to no bedwetting
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! It's easy to use. Clip the sensor on the underwear where the pee would first touch it. The sensor is very sensitive. The alarm is loud, with volume control, and there's several options for sound change to change it up if they were to get used to it. My 5 yo sleeps heavy, which her dr told me is possible, and just the sound isn't enough, she needs the vibration too. She wakes up on her own and goes potty with the sensor where she'd frequently wet the bed before hand. I love this training aid.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Such a difference!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old used to wet 4-5 times a week. He would pee so much that it would soak through a pull up. He’s such a deep sleeper that it didn’t even wake him. This was a dramatic change! He is staying dry! And yes, he got pizza for staying dry for one week. The next goal is ice cream for three weeks. The sensor is a little difficult at first, I recommend laying the underwear flat, attaching it and then putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about a month.
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after about a month. Worked fine at first, and woke up my child with the vibration, but then both sound and vibration just quit working. Made a very quiet clicking sound and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia J.

customer_reviews.title: Must have. Undies by 5 or 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts but after my six year old was still wetting every night we thought we would give it a try. We had an improvement within a week or 2. By 3 weeks no more accidents. Underwear by 5 or 6 weeks. He is actually not having random accidents during the daytime anymore either. He was so focused on playing he wasn't listening to his body. Now he holds his pee longer. This has been the best product I have bought in a long time. It paid for itself in pull ups already. Now I don't have that expense. Get this!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B.

customer_reviews.title: Potty training for special needs
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazing! My special needs 5 year old is potty trained!! We dedicated ourselves to using it consistently over Christmas break. Day one undies, potty alarm attached, diaper over for protection. Within a few days - he didnt want to wear the diaper over his undies - - a few days later he didnt want to wear the alarm. He had two accidents in the house while playing during those two weeks but he is now going independently to the toilet and we are all so proud of him! This is a wonderful alternative for parents struggling to potty train. I'm so glad the OT mentioned it!!
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My now 9 year old son has never had a dry night in his life until we bought this alarm. Up until we bought the alarm we used pull ups night time diapers but what 8 year old wants to wear diapers?! The first few nights involved complete pajama changes and towels on the bed and sheet changes in the morning. (Sheet changes at night are to disturbing to everyone’s ability to get back to sleep) within a few weeks, only underwear changes were needed. He has been dry for about a month and we have finally stopped hooking up the alarm. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does work!
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually worked for our 5-year-old. I didn't have high expectations for it, but it actually did the job in about 4 weeks. Within 2 days he was already waking up before wetting the bed most nights, and by 4 weeks he was consistently dry. We just tried to make it fun from the start and he liked the chart with stickers. The only downside is it is bulky and heavy to wear on the shirt collar and the underwear clip is difficult, even after 4 weeks I never really got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Stay With It
customer_reviews.text: This worked! Thank you thank you! It took about a month or so of me waking her up when the alarm went off, but eventually it worked. Don't give up after the first week or two, the key is consistency. I double sheeted the bed and put incontinence pads between the top sheet and the bottom sheet and then a water-proof mattress cover. This made for easier switches if the alarm did go off. Also, be sure to use with cotton underwear as the polyester stuff would cause sweating and a false alarm. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: worth buying this machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these machines for my twin boys age 10. For one of my sons it worked miracles... it's 3 weeks since he is using it and he hasn't had not one accident!! For my other son most of the times he does not wake up from the beeping sound-- it wakes his twin brother who gets annoyed.. the other one is sound asleep.. if i hear it i wake him and walk him to the bathroom ( although the accidents has definitely decreased since using this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tobie

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, but sensor corroding
customer_reviews.text: It took about six weeks to talk our kid into using this item. It works exactly as it is described. The 'alarm noise' is too startling and we only use the vibration, which still wakes him up. The one main concern is one side of the metal sensor is corroding. We rinse and gently dry the sensor end with towel every time it's used. Thinking about returning or replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miller

customer_reviews.title: No more pull-ups!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4.5 year old daughter who I suspected was nighttime potty trained but lacked motivation to get out of bed. This device confirmed my suspicion and gave her a reason to stop peeing in her bed. She had one true accident on the first night and has been accident free for 6 or so weeks now. I’ve kept it on because she is 4, and likes to “test” that it still works sometimes. Thanks to this we haven’t had to buy pull ups or change wet sheets in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: ssapphire

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 year old who still has problems controlling night time bedwetting. Her pediatrician recommended a sleep alarm, so we chose this one after looking at many reviews. This alarm works very well. It is very sensitive and will detect even a little wetness. It had gone off a couple nights just from sweating (summertime) , but we didn't mind. My daughters only complaint is that the cord being run under her pj shirt and the alarm that clips on the shoulder of her shirt aren't very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product. My 6 yr old has wet the bed nightly her whole life. She was starting to grow out of pull ups and the big kid night time pants where getting expensive as well as her growing more aware that other kids don't regularly wear them. We used the arm band for about a week and a half. It woke her up every night just in time to go potty. She was able to turn off the alarm and reattach the sensor all by herself. Within just a short time she stopped wetting the bed! She now wakes on her own to use the bathroom at night. I wish I would have used this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L.

customer_reviews.title: Very short cord
customer_reviews.text: Would work if I was potty training a baby, but the cord is so short that it wouldn't go from my son's(he's 6) underwear to his arm as designed. I've used these before with great success, but this isnt something that will work for taller children.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingMomOf5

customer_reviews.title: This thing works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works! My son used to wet the bed almost every night, nothing worked before this thing, but after I started using this he went from every night to zero night like in about 2 days, no more wet bed, ever. A few drops come out 2 to 3 times a week and I have to get up and turn it off, but that's it. I think in a few months he won't need it anymore. This alarm has been a bless to us :)
customer_reviews.author: DJBory

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and worked great with my daughter. We have not had an accident in months and within a week she started being dry regularly. It’s been several months that we have had any accidents at all. I got a potty pad that tucked under the bed and placed on top of the sheets so I just took that pad off and popped in the wash and was very easy and quick to get her right back and going. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before purchasing and found a lot of good tips, so I recommend the more detailed reviews. It took about 5 weeks of slow improvements, but then something seemed to click with it 5 year old son and now he's gone 15 nights with absolutely no accidents. He is so proud and we loved the chart it came with. This has literally changed our mornings... My son is excited to feel like a real big boy and we are happy to not being washing so much bedding and pajamas. I highly recommend this product, just listen to reviews on how to use it and be patient because it did take a little longer than we thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got the device, for my sister who's 11 she hasn't been wetting the bed *laughs* so.. haven't had to wake up to an alarm. which is a good thing I guess but at the same time, ugh! but it works when water touches the sensor, and its effective! whether that be a mental trigger to "wake up or bro's gonna kill me" (joking of course) or some other thing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't wake well..
customer_reviews.text: This has been used for a couple weeks. It's not waking them up well eventhough settings have sound and vibratio... also.. it's corroded inside. It was turned on and it started making a ticking sound and then started beeping like crazy. I opened it to take the battery out and found this. We've had this barely 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: MurElly

customer_reviews.title: Great night training alarm.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm was recommended to us by our pediatrician for persistent bedwetting in our 10 year old son. Easy to use, just clips to the underwear. Can be set to alarm, vibrate or both when wetness is detected. It has helped my son soooo much. He went from having accidents 3 or 4 nights a week to maybe 1 every other week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good except the clips are frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Stickers are motivating and it wakes up my deep sleeper with me in the room to get her out of bed. However the clip keeps detaching from the arm band and her nightgown, either I use. It's causing A LOT of frustration at already exhausting times of the day. Also the underwear clip is very difficult even for an adult to get on. She can't do it herself.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Hallelujah! It worked!
customer_reviews.text: Our six year old has struggled with nighttime bed wetting for years. We’ve tried thick nighttime underwear, pull-ups, and peejamas. We tried bribing everything under the sun. With all these we would take him potty throughout the night but he’d still be wet either in the night or in the morning. The first few days with this alarm seemed to have the same results. Within the first week though he had a dry night. Then two. Then more and more. Within three weeks he stays dry all night long. Now he doesn’t even need the alarm. This alarm works!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It does what it supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great without any error. My 5 year old son almost done training with this after like 3 months. In the beginning he used to cry fom loud noise waking up in the middle of deep sleep, but later he stopped peeing right away and hold the button until I come to him to completely disable the device. He is so happy as he learns how to control himself and I am also very happy to see him happy. Very satisfied. :)
customer_reviews.author: spark

customer_reviews.title: The Photo Makes it Look Complicated
customer_reviews.text: This little device was great and helped my remaining kid get night trained. I like using the arm band vs clipping to clothing, but both work well. The hardest part is getting the sensor in place without pinching the kid. Two weeks and it really helped make the difference. I'd definitely recommend to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys White

customer_reviews.title: Quick, lasting results for our child
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our 9 year old. Easy enough that he is able to put it on and take it off himself. Several loud alarm options and vibrate setting. He began having dry nights after the second night. Only 1 wet night in the past 2 months. Highly recommend. A little uncomfortable to attach to collar, as it ends up wedged under his chin most nights.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy one sooner
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is going on 9 and still sleeps so hard that she just has accidents. This thing is amazing at the very smallest sign of moisture it goes off and she immediately gets up. So now we change panties that are barely even wet instead of changing soaking wet bed sheets. This thing has been a lifesaver
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: We actually used this for daytime wetting and in less than a couple weeks it trained our child to not hold their urine as long. Extremely impressed with this as we knew our child was just being stubborn.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this product for a few months on purpose. I have a 7 year old son who has been wetting his bed non-stop for the past 3 years. After using this product for roughly 8 weeks months he is now able to keep himself dry every morning. We stopped using the alarm a few weeks ago and he still is staying dry every night. This product delivered what it promised and it's exactly what we needed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: This worked in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old begged for me to get this for him. I was on the fence, but did anyway. I couldn't be happier with the results. It went off 3-4 times the first 2 nights, 2 the third and 1 the 4th, and by then the 5th night, he had trained himself to wake up before the alarm. I'm sure that it helps that he is older and thus more ready to potty train overnight, but this has been a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn S

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for this product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but we kept it up and my almost 5 year old daughter is now wearing undies at night! It took a few weeks to get the hang of it. We had one set back at week 5 because she stayed up too late at Grandma’s and didn’t go potty before bed. Still keeping a pad over her sheets just in case but so far so good! She day potty trained at 2 1/2 years but we couldn’t get down night training. No more Pulls Ups to bed after 2+ years! So thankful for this product. I definitely recommend it if your child is having difficulty night training but has accomplished day training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alarm did not go off during the night
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work as required. The good: multiple alarm settings (different sounds, can raise/lower the volume), attach easily to clothing, but also detach easily when time to remove it, comes with a small sticker chart. The bad: the alarm only went off when we tested it with liquid like water. It never went off during the night during bed-wetting incidents, even when attached to undergarments in the correct spot. I would have given it one-star, but the shipping and product delivery were good. No issues with the seller, I was able to return it with free shipping, so I'm happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieKate

customer_reviews.title: Alarm works great! Very grateful for its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.text: Very effective method. After only having to wake her up with the alarm 3-4 nights, my daughter has gone almost 3 full weeks with no accidents. Very happy about that. However, the clip that is suppose to hold the strap in place broke, only after 2 weeks. A bit disappointed about that. I'd give it 5 stars, if it hadn't broken on the outside. But the alarm part still works. I just get nervous about the cord being loose in the bed with her.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This product did actually work for my child - hooray! It is very loud - we put a little piece of tape over the speaker to soften it a little. I like the different alarm sound options. We picked one that didn't seem as startling. I don't think it was all that comfortable, but i think it was as comfy as it could be for what it needs to do. We also put a pull up over underwear to start. By 3 weeks in my child was dry at night! And that had NEVER happened before! So happy we purchased this!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 4th night
customer_reviews.text: This broke on the 4th night. The alarm won’t stop going off no matter what we do. We finally removed the batteries to get it to stop. We’re quite disappointed. My daughter is 8 years old and wants desperately to make it through the night dry, but she sleeps so hard that she doesn’t wake up when she begins to urinate. The alarm worked for three days and she was so encouraged. Now she is feeling very bad about herself again. This was supposed to help her self esteem and instead it had the exact opposite effect. She’s heartbroken.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lisk

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 8 weeks....
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars because it was working... but it just broke and we have only had it for 8 weeks. Stopped functioning completely.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Berman

customer_reviews.title: Best money I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6.5 years old and has never been dry at night with the exception of a few rare nights. We have only used this product for 6 nights so far and we have already had 2 consecutive dry nights. My daughter loves wearing her alarm and refuses to go to bed without it. She's donated all her pull ups to her baby cousin. Best money I have ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: This product came as described. My son loved the chart and stickers. Unfortunately, it didn't work. We tried sleeping in the same room as him and making him get up every time the alarm went off. For. Two. Weeks. He never got up on his own with the alarm. It's very loud, but he's just a deep sleeper. But it did work exactly as described :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my 8 year old deep sleeper ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 year old deep sleeper who was wetting the bed on a nightly basis and was determined to be out of pull ups in time for summer camp. It’s been 2 months and we are now seeing more dry nights than wet! I have no doubt that he will be all the way there by summer with consistent use. The only reason I’m not giving 5 stars is because the clip that attaches to the underwear is a little tricky to operate until you get the hang of it. This resulted in him pinching himself on the privates.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Severson

customer_reviews.title: It worked for our 6 year old!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a miracle worker!! If you’re hesitating to buy it like I was, don’t! We used it for our 6 year old son who was wet every single night. I will also add that he hates loud noises and alarms, but he was totally fine with this. We gave him a primer during the day to show him what it would be like so he knew what to expect. As you can see, it does take time...so don’t give up during week 3 when you feel like it’s not working. Use the chart - it will help you see the progress being made. Get this - it works!
customer_reviews.author: J. Melnic

customer_reviews.title: Simple, IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonders for my 9yr old son. He is a deep sleeper and I would have to wake him up for the first 2 weeks until he started getting up on his own. He would go a couple of nights between accidents but after about 6 weeks, the bedwetting stopped. He no longer wears it and has been accident free since. I would recommend this to anyone who has a child with a bedwetting issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tom F.

customer_reviews.title: My son has been using it for the last month ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using it for the last month anda half. I feel that it has improved his peeing habits at night. He went from peeing every night to peeing twice a week in his underwear. The bedding alarm also helps him when he starts to pee in his underwear and the alarm goes off, it make him stop and he get up goes to the bathroom. He now self-consciously wakes up without realizing it and going to the bathroom. Where as before he would sleep through the whole night cause And have a large amount of urine in his diaper( My son is a very heavy sleeper) It's definitely taking some time but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for nighttime bedwetting!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo son wore it nightly for less than a month. I was so surprised how quickly it helped. He started wearing the clip with underwear and we would put a pullup over it [in case he did pee and we didn'thave to change his whole bedding]. After only having a few small accidents the first 2 weeks - the monitor would wake him up and he would get to the bathroom to finish peeing. He then just wore it with underwear. So thankful for such a useful!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. After a difficult time of trying to get our son to stop wetting the bed we tried this device, with reservations. We followed the directions to the T- it was a long journey and many nights of having to wake him up when the alarm went off, because he is a very heavy sleeper. We continued the process all the way to the end of the program-and it worked! My son also enjoyed seeing his progress on the chart. There were many ups and downs, but just keep with it. He has been bed wetting free ever since. Wonderful product. Saved our son embarrassment, me sleepless nights and our washing machine many extra loads.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: If you get a unit that actually works, it would be a great product for the value.
customer_reviews.text: Well, you can't beat the price. And for the three or four days before it malfunctioned it worked great. But a few days in the alarm went off and wouldn't stop. Pressing the reset button was ineffectual and it only turned off when we unplugged the sensor from the alarm. The price plus the variety of sound/vibration settings (and adjustable volume) were appealing. But the fact that it worked less than a week before breaking down completely made it rather useless. We had to return it. (Thank you, Amazon for your generous return policy.)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Solis

customer_reviews.title: Good option for a child that sweats
customer_reviews.text: Other alarms did not work because the child would sweat. Our child also learned to sleep through the alarm after one week. We used a baby monitor to hear the alarm and woke them up to ise the bathroom. And coupled with a bedmat that sits on top of the sheets, it worked in about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Connecticut Parent

customer_reviews.title: Great success with this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded our expectations! Wow!!!!! My son just couldn’t stay dry at night even after I would get him up multiple times. Quality of life isn’t so great when mom is up all night!!!! The first night was a little rough because of the unknown but we made it through! Day 8 is the first night of 100% dryness! Day 10 after a long day at a local amusement park still dry! That is huge. This product has given a 5 year old more self confidence and he is now excited to go to bed instead of scared! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Simple, inexpensive, and effective
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the slickest-looking of the bedwetting alarms, but after trying several we found it to be the best and one of the least expensive. It’s super simple, the sensor does not come unplugged when the child tosses and turns (a problem with some others), the alarm is loud enough, and it’s comfortable. My 9-year-old could do the whole thing himself: I was not involved. Within a month he was waking himself up to pee in the night rather than being awoken by the alarm, which is the goal. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Van Dusen

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to use and worked well for my 9 year old son. He had worn pullups for years, often overflowing even when doubled up. We started and finished within 12 weeks, and used it diligently and specific to the directions. The first two weeks of sleeping close by him were tough, but they worked with us cuing him to get up rather than him sleeping through it. We did it during a summer when we did not travel much until the end, when he could use the Dry Easy without us. He is so happy, and in the 8 weeks since ceasing using it, he has not had one accident and sleeps so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked quickly
customer_reviews.text: This worked surprisingly well! My nearly 7 year old was waking up with a wet pull-up every morning. I tried waking him up at night to go but he was too sound asleep. This alarm only went off 4 times. He wore it for 2 weeks and now is sleeping without it and is waking up dry! I think part of it was his age and he was really ready to do it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Here is why it only gets 3 stars. The concept of it is great, however the cord that senses the moisture keeps coming unplugged from the alarm that attaches to the clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and it’s working
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on which product to buy and couldn’t understand why there was such a price differences between some items. Given this was a best seller and priced very low - I figured it’s a low risk purchase. Great choice! It’s doing exactly what it’s supposed to do. I am careful with the clip since other reviews warned of it braking easily. So far so good. It is still being used and hope to be off soon but he is having progress and that’s more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: hl

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We were worried when our 5 year old was about to turn 6 and was still using a pull-up at night and no end in sight. We used this (which my son calls a pee bracelet) and he was done with bed wetting in 6 weeks. I don’t know why you’d buy a more expensive one. This works.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so pleased to say my 9 year old daughter has dry nights! I wish I had tried this sooner. I slept in her room to help her through the first week. I made sure she got up when the alarm sounded and reattached it after she went to the bathroom. She just completed her two weeks of dry nights using the alarm after just shy of two weeks with “cloudy “ days. After the first week I used a baby monitor to know when the alarm sounded so I could have a more restful night. The box says 6-12 weeks but for us it was a little less than 4! I have a very happy girl.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This alarm works great. It has several settings to change volume and tone. Also has a vibrating base. Unfortunately, my child is such a deep sleeper that he still didn’t wake even with it clipped to his collar. The rest of the house woke in other rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Trax

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worked for my very deep sleeping 8-year-old son. In less than one month of use, he went front nightly accidents to completely accident-free. It worked so well for my son, we started using it for my daughter. During her time using it, the wire broke. I contacted customer service on a Monday evening and I had a new cord by Thursday. I couldn't be happier with this product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Calnon

customer_reviews.title: Well, it's an alarm. Sadly, we have ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's an alarm. Sadly, we have owned this for less than 2 weeks and have replaced the batteries THREE times already. My son has 1 accident a night on average. Sometimes 2. He hasn't woken to the alarm once (which was expected) but the fact it dies so insanely fast is going to become very costly.
customer_reviews.author: DIEHARD537

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, always worked
customer_reviews.text: This thing was great. Our kid was totally committed to getting “sunny” stickers and could put the alarm on without help after a few days of us showing how to do it. It really cut down on bed wetting right away. Our kid still had a few weeks of setbacks and got discouraged, but the alarm ALWAYS worked and helped my kid get up to run to the bathroom instead of wetting the bed and sleeping right through it. Fair warning: it took us 16 weeks to have consistent dry nights.
customer_reviews.author: David R Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: 5 yo now doesn't wet bed at night
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for my daughter, she turned 5 and couldn't stay dry and was in pull ups so we decided to try this out. It was bulky but she got used to it and after a few weeks she doesn't have accidents anymore! There was one night where did rip it off and pee in the bed because she was so tired, but other than that it worked great for her
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old autistic son hadn’t had a dry night his entire life. He would pee multiple times sine nights and not wake up. We started the alarm the night we received it.It alarmed every night for two weeks. The alarm didn’t wake him up but it woke me up. So I would go in his room and wake him up to finish peeing change out of his wet undies and change his pee pad/ blanket. After two weeks of that, he started getting up on his own. He hasn’t had an accident since. It’s been almost a month since his last accident.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: At first we were pretty excited about this bedwetting alarm. It got good reviews, had multiple sound modes, and seemed to be working pretty well. We only used the devise about 5 weeks - and it stopped working altogether about 2 weeks after the return window closed. We are on to another style of bedwetting alarm to try, but to be honest it's disappointing to essentially throw money out the window with a product that wasn't built to last (even long enough to finish the suggested amount of time to resolve the issue). Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: We love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product actually works!!! My eight year old is super embarrassed as he has not been able to get out of pull ups. He’s a deep sleeper and even when I set an alarm for myself to wake him it still wasn’t working. We have used this for only two weeks...and will continue until we are confident that he is done....but in the two weeks he is already waking on his own during the night to use the restroom AND he’s staying dry. His confidence has soared through the roof! Thank you so much! This is a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: What!!??
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes!!! This freakin think actually worked!! Took 2 weeks! Had to wake up every night to the crazy alarm, but that snapped his brain out of the routine of peeing while asleep! My wife and I took turns on who had to wake up. Some nights just a little pee and others with whole bed soaked. But then, suddenly NOTHING! It’s been a whole month and no pee! I even hear him get up all on his own in the middle of the night to go to the bathroom! Only “negative” and this is just being really nit pickey is the size of the unit and length of cord (too long), but we made it work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for us.
customer_reviews.text: I would absolutely recommend this product for night time or even day time potty training. Purchased for our 6yr old son. Its loud enough to wake him up but not so loud it woke his 2yr old sister in the next room. Its easy enough for him to put n and use himself. He is a super heavy sleeper and even on its lowest setting woke him up. We used vibration and ransom sounds. I was skeptical about it working and kind of resigned to him being in overnight pull-ups for years. But for him it worked! Im so happy/relieved and he's super excied and proud of himself.
customer_reviews.author: AprilA

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for my 10 year old daughter. The multiple sounds help so when she gets used to one sound, we switch it to a new sound. She says the vibration helps to wake her up. Also it accidentally got tangled in her sheets and went through the washing machine. We just knew we would have to purchase a new one, but unbelievably we popped in some new batteries and it works just like new! While washing is NOT recommended, it has lasted and lasted for my daughter. From time to time she will get out of practice and have to wear it again and it keeps working to wake her up.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Immediately effective!
customer_reviews.text: Has an immediate psychological effect that helps it work. Requires prolonged usage even without bed-wetting to have a long-term psychological effect. Many months after stopping its usage bed-wetting returned.
customer_reviews.author: A. Robateau

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to purchase this as another name brand I'd purchased before would not turn off after the first pee. This one was not like that at all and it worked great. My 8yo was able to get himself set up at night before bed. It took about two weeks but he's now sleeping dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really recommended this great solution for bed wetting!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 year old who just slept so soundly he never could wake up to go to the bathroom. Our doctor said it was normal and suggested that if we didn’t want to wait any longer to try this. In just one week we had success. It really trained his mind to be able to know when he needed to wake up. Cord is long but we tucked it in. A bit hard to clip onto underpants but we got used to it and so did he. Volume and sound options are good. It is important to sleep in the same room with them for the first week or so (probably age dependent.).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker to stop night time bed wetting for 7 yr old
customer_reviews.text: So far, this product has worked wonders for our 7 year old that was having problems staying dry at night. He has more dry nights in a month than he has had in years. Even when he has small accidents, he is able to stop mid stream when he hears alarm and then get to bathroom to finish. The device cords are not that comfortable to sleep with wrapped around his arm, but it’s manageable for the price to avoid the wireless costs. No complaints about this device and so thankful it is helping.
customer_reviews.author: CRF2318

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Instructions were easy to follow. After 5 nights of the alarm going off my daughter was used to it and began staying dry. After she was dry for one week (the second week) tried her without the alarm and she stayed dry the first night. Second night not so much. Back to the alarm. I know I shouldn't have taken it away so soon. Used a similar one for my oldest daughter (teenager now) and she was dry all the time after one month of training.
customer_reviews.author: L. Heflin

product_meta.title: DryEasy Bedwetting Alarm with Volume Control, 6 Selectable Sounds and Vibration
feature_bullets: New and improved toggle clamp locks the sensor securely in place. Reliable sensor detects the first drop of urine and alerts the child as soon as bedwetting occurs.
6 sounds to suit users' preference and avoid users from getting used of a particular sound. With options to choose a single sound or play the 6 sounds at random.
4 levels of digital volume control to cater to different needs. Support max. loudness of 85 db.
Operation modes including sound plus vibration, sound only and vibration only.
CE certified, ISO 9001:2008 and ISO 13485 (for medical devices).
